issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing OptionsDialog, I noticed, that after click on "Show w/hide, animated" and "Show w/hide, nonanimated" buttons, options dialog shown, but not hidden. 
Also tested on 1.8.2 iPod 4.3.5 and found the same issue.

Steps:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI-Views-Options Dialog
3. Click on "Show w/hide, animated"
4. Click on "Show w/hide, nonanimated"

Expected result:
Options dialog should be shown and hidden in 2 seconds.

Actual result:
Options dialog shown, but not hidden.
fields.summary: iOS: OptionsDialog - Hide function does not work
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.0.0.v20120327114816
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.0.201203270923
Device: iPod 4.0.2

comments.body:
Issue does not reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
